modName: Whiterun Performance Overhaul     (  up to 12 FPS )
summary: This mod adds small immersive details to Whiterun while generally improving performance (through the optimized use of occlusion planes) on the majority of systems.
descriptionHtml:
This mod features:

[color=#93c47d]- Several trees around Whiterun 
- New fencing around Bannered Mare
- More immersive market area
- Several Benches and Rocks to reduce the dullness of the landscape
- Occlusion planes in the majority of static objects, improving performance
- A lot of hanging moss :)
[/color]
Regarding performance:

Occlusion planes are an engine-integrated method for disabling the rendering of invisible polygons and textures.
It is the same method rgabriel used in his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/?]Skyrim Project Optimization[/url].
These can be found in most large static objects throughout Skyrim to disable rendering behind said object.
I added these into smaller objects like Posts and smaller houses, resulting in a general performance boost.

This mod should atleast give you +-/0 Fps, because of the added details.

Tested on following machines:

1st:   mine                      average:  [color=#93c47d]FPS +12
[/color]2nd:  buddy                     average:  [color=#93c47d]FPS +7[/color]
3rd:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1242351]asenasen[/url]                 average:  [color=#93c47d]FPS +5[/color]

These results may vary and I'd love to have your feedback.
author: Baskiney
